list-item.p: Creation of knowledge through research and its enhancement through workshops; formal and informal. The working groups will be tasked to create knowledge suited to the needs of the settings.
Mainstreaming of the knowledge thus created into institutional/organizational functioning, for example, by integrating it with the school/college/university curriculum.
Development of modules/training/teaching material for use by the leaders and “Champions”.
Conducting training and workshops for health and social workers, Self Help Groups, NGOs, school/college/university teachers etc.
Conduct workshops/IEC activities through advocacy workshops among Panchayati Raj institutions (PRI) to implement guidelines, strengthen school/college/university-based programs in prevention.
Redesigning the epidemic prevention strategy including task sharing and transfer.
